Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, everyone! Thanks to your generous
support, we are once again able to put on a
Fireworks Show for the whole town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This year, <MYNAME> was especially charitable,
donating greatly to the fireworks fund. Let's give
a round of applause for <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This year, we received a donation from
<MYNAME> in the staggering amount of
100,000G! What magnanimous generosity!
<PAGE>
Everyone, let's hear a rousing round of applause
for <MYNAME>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, it seems everything is in order, so we're
ready to begin the fireworks. Find your favorite
spot, sit back, and enjoy the scintillating display.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
C'mon, let's go find a good spot and kick back
to watch!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well then, what do you say we find a
comfortable spot with a nice view?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's go look for a good place to watch. We'd
better hurry, though, or they'll get nabbed right
out from under us.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's find a favorable vantage from which we
can enjoy the show!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, you know any good spots? I wanna enjoy
the fireworks.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Come on, let's go find a spot with a better view.
We're gonna relax and enjoy this evening.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There must be a spot with a better view. Go and
find us a good place to watch the show.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's go find a good place to watch the
festivities, shall we?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
C'mon, let's hurry and find a good place to
watch the fireworks.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We'd better hurry and find a good spot before
the fireworks start. Let's go!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I know an excellent spot for watching the
fireworks. Let's go.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Nothing like watching colorful explosions for
fun! C'mon, let's get a good seat.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, they're so pretty!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Watching fireworks always makes me feel so
alive!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, they sure are puttin' on a show this year!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. These are actually quite lovely!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrmm. I guess being downwind wasn't such a
bright idea. I can really smell the gunpowder.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's difficult to be bored watching fireworks.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've always loved watching fireworks. Perhaps I
should've brought along some wine to enhance
the experience...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! They're so beautiful, I can't help but stare.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been having a great time. It really takes me
back to when I'd come watch them as a kid.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow. It's a very impressive display, especially
with the sounds of the explosions so close.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love seeing the sky lit up by the brilliance of
fireworks.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I watch the fireworks really closely, I almost
feel like I'm up there in the night sky.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Not bad. These are real pretty. They've done a
nice job this year.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's too dark to see clearly, but this whole area's
getting pretty smoky.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's fireworks displays like this where pyrotechnic
experts really get to strut their stuff.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love reveling in the beauty of fireworks. They're
like flowers of light unfolding in the night sky.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Big firework displays like this are great, but I'm
also fond of quieter, personal stuff like sparklers
and things like that.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's so easy to lose track of time watching
something like this. It just sweeps you up,
y'know?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, how lovely! It has been forever and a day
since I last enjoyed a fireworks display.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
With fireworks this big, I think we may have
been able to enjoy watching them from my
garden.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, I think it would have been lovely if
we could have had a small buffet to enjoy while
watching these fireworks.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's amazing how fireworks have that sudden
dramatic impact, with the gap between when
you see the light and hear the boom.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, how spectacular! It's like being caught up in
a world of light. Let's just enjoy it for a while...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, they certainly are pulling out all the stops
this year!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oooh, how pretty!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so glad we had good weather this year. I
mean, if it rained, everything would've been
ruined!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a great spot! I can see everything from
here.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, they're so pretty!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fireworks are so pretty...! But I'm sure all the
animals living in the forest are terribly startled by
all the loud booming.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so glad I got to watch this. We could all use
a little more beauty in our lives.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It has been a long time since I was last able to
watch the fireworks. They're quite lovely.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Staying up too late is bad for your health. As
soon as these are over, we should go right home
and go to sleep.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It seems we inadvertently picked a spot
downwind from the show. It's rather smoky
here.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've always enjoyed a good fireworks display.
You never know what they'll fire off next.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It looks like they're aiming the fireworks up over
the mountain. I hope the trees in the forests up
there aren't in danger of getting scorched...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Watching fireworks always puts me in a good
mood. It's like watching flowers blossom in the
sky.
Here comes another one...!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Lookit! Lookit! Aren't they pretty?
Yeah! They're really pretty!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! They're so big they cover the whole sky!

They sure are showing off this year. Is everybody
having fun?
Soooo pretty! I could watch these all night long!

That was loads of fun! Let's come watch again
next year!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ladies and gentlemen, this concludes this year's
Fireworks Show. I hope you all had a wonderful
time. Please take care on your way home, now!
